thread.title: Wonderful Colorful Center of Times Square
thread.title_full: Wonderful Colorful Center of Times Square - Review of Hilton Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: A946JVangelac
title: Wonderful Colorful Center of Times Square
text: Love this Beautiful Clean Bright Hotel. Staff was wonderful and helpful. Beds were plush and soft and very comfortable. This hotel was in the center of everything Times Square. Our room was located on the 32 floor, and with Black-out curtains on every room, you could sleep peacefully and quietly anytime of the day. This hotels staff was wonderful. Elevators were lightning fast, there were 6 of them, breakfast was pricey but was great, over 10 other restaurants within 1/2 block if you want anything else. ABSOLUTELY LOVED THIS HOTEL... WILL RETURN !!!
